meanings.definition: Straightest or most straightforward in direction or course.
meanings.sent1: The directest path to the park is through the main gate.
meanings.sent2: She took the directest route to solve the math problem.
meanings.sent3: The directest way to the treasure was under the big tree.
meanings.sent4: His directest gaze made her feel uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The directest road is always the fastest.

meanings.definition: Most immediate or straightforward in effect or relationship.
meanings.sent1: The directest impact of the storm was seen on the trees.
meanings.sent2: His directest response was to apologize immediately.
meanings.sent3: The directest way to make her smile was to tell a joke.
meanings.sent4: Her directest emotions were evident in her tears.
meanings.sent5: The directest approach is often the most effective.

meanings.definition: To guide, control, or manage with authority or precision.
meanings.sent1: He will directest the team towards victory with his strategies.
meanings.sent2: She directest the meeting with confidence and clarity.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to directest the dog's movements around the house.
meanings.sent4: The teacher directest the students' attention to the whiteboard.
meanings.sent5: The coach directest the players to focus on their training.
